game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the lost artifact of Vallenwood
game.description: The mayor of Vallenwood has tasked you with finding the lost artifact that has brought prosperity and luck to the villagers. It was taken by the notorious Thief of Shadows and it is believed to be hidden somewhere in the Shadows Den.

tasks.description: Look for the hidden cave near the Old Oak, it is known to be the hiding spot of the Thief of Shadows.
Overcome the traps and puzzles of the Shadows Den to find and retrieve the lost artifact.
